subject: List of Provisionally Qualified Bidders for EPC; HAM and BOT (Toll) Projects to avoid repetitive examination of bidding documents by Technical Divisions - reg.
text: IRayy 754 TTARf xfeabrut (Tsw 4Rdav er RVTHRf T4, HRG TaR) National Highways Authority of India FAT TR (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 0i-5 Qi 6, Tdr7-10, E1QFI, 78f feelt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Procurement /2022 Policy Circular No. 9.1.13/2022 dated 3rd June, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD /QualifiedBidder /2022 (Computer No: 149957)} Sub:: List of Provisionally Qualified Bidders for EPC, HAM and BOT (Toll) Projects to avoid repetitive examination of bidding documents by Technical Divisions reg: bidder normally submits the bids for civil works in different projects and Technical Capacity & Financial Capacity of the same bidder is being assessed in each & every project by Technical Divisions which consumes a lot of energy and time. 2 In order to avoid repetitive examination, lists of Provisionally Qualified Bidders for EPC, HAM and BOT (Toll) Projects have been prepared based on the bidding Documents received from 01.10.2021 to 31.03.2022 for EPC, HAM & BOT (Toll) Projects. Accordingly lists of Technically Qualified Bidders for EPC, HAM and BOT (Toll) Projects are attached at Annexure- 1, Annexure-2 & Annexure- 3 respectively. This list shall be valid up to 30.06.2022. 3. Accordingly, Technical Division may assess the bid without referring to Annex: Il, IlI & IV of Appendix-IA for EPC, HAM & BOT (Toll) Projects if the Estimated Project Cost of the subject project is less than or equal to the Estimated Project Cost declared in the list of Provisionally Qualified Bidders, and for rest of the criterion, bid shall be assessed by the Technical Divisions as per requirement of the RFP. Further, Technical Division will be required to assess the specific qualifications regarding structures i.e. Tunnel & Bridges if applicable for the project, Bid Capacity in case of EPC projects and in case of HAM Projects, the Technical Division would require to assess the Bidder eligibility criteria circulated through NHAI Policy Circular No. 11.36/2022 dated 27.04.2022. 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl: As above_ 2 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord ) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1. Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2 . Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3 . Web Admin for circulation a 7 U M NHAI T19 , 9 22 Copy
